nodes.text: The Chiss Poacher Base was a space station in the Kashyyyk system. Unlike other hunters who paid the Empire for the opportunity to hunt creatures on Kashyyyk, the Chiss were poachers who took what they wish without asking or worrying about the repercussions of breaking galactic law. The Chiss' vast financial holdings kept their supply lines running smoothly, and their access to numerous independent shipyards keep their fighting vessels on constant patrol.
Several large asteroids floated near the station.
